definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: engrave (NH Pi. id.,[[פִּתּוּחַ]] = BH, and so Targum; As. patâḫu, bore, penetrate; cf. perh. Ar. fataxah;un, fatxah;un ring (cf. Frä:252));—Pf. 3 ms. [[פִּתַּח]] 2Ch 3:7, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיְפַתַּח]] 1Ki 7:36; 2 ms. [[תְּפַתַּח]] Ex 28:11; Inf. cstr. [[לְפַתֵּחַ]] 2Ch 2:6, 2Ch 2:13; Pt. [[מְפַתֵּחַ]] Zec 3:9; —engrave, c. acc. + [[על]] , on metal 1Ki 7:36, 2Ch 3:7, Ex 28:36 (acc. cogn. [[פִּתּוּחֵי חוֹתָם]]), on stone v:Ex 28:9; c. acc. [[אֶבֶן]] + acc. cogn. v:Ex 28:11(all P); c. acc. cogn. only, Zec 3:9 (on stone), and, in gen., 2Ch 2:6, 2Ch 2:13.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[מְפֻתָּחׂת פִתּוּחֵי חוֹתָם]] Ex 39:9 (P) stones engraved with the engravings of signet.
